citation.case_name: DeGregory v. Attorney General of NH

html:
368 U.S. 19

82 S.Ct. 137

7 L.Ed.2d 86

Hugo DE GREGORY
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL OF NEW HAMPSHIRE.

No. 237, Misc.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 23, 1961

Howard S. Whiteside, for appellant.

Gardner C. Turner, Atty. Gen. of New Hampshire, pro se.

PER CURIAM.

1

The judgment is affirmed.

2

THE CHIEF JUSTICE, Mr. Justice BLACK, Mr. Justice DOUGLAS and Mr. Justice BRENNAN dissent.

DEGREGORY
v.
ATTORNEY GENERAL OF NEW HAMPSHIRE.

No. 237, Misc.

Supreme Court of United States.

Decided October 23, 1961.

Howard S. Whiteside for appellant.

PER CURIAM.

THE CHIEF JUSTICE, MR. JUSTICE BLACK, MR. JUSTICE DOUGLAS and MR. JUSTICE BRENNAN dissent.
